tool_description: Storytelling data on the highest-grossing media franchises
title: Transmedia Storytelling

api_list.name: Get All Mediums
api_list.description: Returns a list of all mediums in the database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://transmedia-storytelling.p.rapidapi.com/mediums"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "transmedia-storytelling.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Franchises by Medium of Inception
api_list.description: Returns a list of all franchises with the given medium of inception
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://transmedia-storytelling.p.rapidapi.com/franchises/medium_of_inception/{medium}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "transmedia-storytelling.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Franchises by Transmedia
api_list.description: Returns a list of franchises with the corresponding transmedia value (true, indicating a transmedia franchise, or false, indicating a single-medium franchise)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://transmedia-storytelling.p.rapidapi.com/franchises/transmedia/{bool}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "transmedia-storytelling.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
